column4: I get a error when logging into gnome that the session lasted less than 10 seconds and was ended. When I click OK it goes back to the login screen. Any ideas how to fix this in failsafe gnome?
do you get an error about accessing .ICEauthority?
I had a problem like that at one point. I needed to "sudo chown $user:$group /.ICEauthority"
where I wrote $user:$group put your group & user - weems:weems or whatever
